subject_knowledge_what_to_improve: The degree qualification is not related to the subject chosen. Although the personal statement refers to an interest in physics, this then refers to biomechanics  and a list of subjects unrelated to physics. While an application for Biology might have been considered, there is insufficient expertise in Physics evidence within the application.
qualifications_other_reason_details: Your degree subject (Sports and Exercise Science) is not closely related to the chosen teaching subject (Physics) and you do not have an A level in the chosen subject. You refer to biomechanics but this would be more relevant to biology, not physics.
